tourBios.curYrHigh: Joined PGA TOUR Latinoamérica by finishing solo eighth at the Bogota Q-School in January.
tourBios.personal: Graduated from Indiana University-Purdue University Indianapolis (IUPUI) with a degree in mechanical engineering in 2015… Would be an engineer if not a professional golfer... Favorite golf memory was being a member of Spain's Junior National Team… His biggest thrill in golf is the competition… Sergio García, José María Olazábal and Miguel Ángel Jiménez would round out his dream foursome… Instagram name is @jsegurol
tourBios.exmtStatus: Exempt - Finished 2-11 at 2016 Q-School (exempt to midseason reshuffle)
